about_the_game:
DESCRIPTION

Inspired by Vampire Slayers and Binding of Isaac, Polycar Blitz brings the vehicle combat madness with a top-down rouge-lite element into outer space! You and your Polycar are the only thing holding back the monster invasion, defend your moon-base and burn every drop of gasoline you have! How many waves of enemies will you be able to survive?

FEATURES

Simple and addictive fun! Check out the list of features below:

  • Infinite Rounds - Push your Polycar to its limit
  • Multiple Vehicle Upgrades - Upgrade your vehicle's health, damage, weapon type, and more!
  • Monster Types - Face off against oncoming hoards of various monsters and abilities
  • Challenging Difficulty - Each level brings additional monsters and increased difficulty
  • Unlock Rewards - Complete missions to unlock additional skins for your Polycar!
  • Steam Achievements - Enjoy full Steam Achievement support
  • Steam Leaderboards - Brag to your friends on-top of the leaderboards!

RELEASE

Stay up-to-date on our Steam or over on the official Discord and for more details on the official release!

short_description: Shift into high gear and defend the moon! A casual top-down vehicle shooter with rouge-lite elements, gun down monsters and upgrade your vehicle to fend off against increasingly difficult waves of enemies!
